No offense, but this is definitely not a DVD rip.  If a cam is a 2/3 and a DVD rip is a 10, this is at most a 6 or 7.  I don't understand why people ever label things a DVD rip if once you download the movie it is quite apparent that it is no where near the quality of a DVD rip.  Stop mis-labeling things, it just makes people distrust your future downloads.

V: 6
A: 7

This is not a DVDRip.  So do not label it as such.
On another note, thank you raymondhome, this is the best quality version out there so far, so kudos to you.  But shame on you for mislabeling it, it does not make you any cooler.
